metadata.title: Code for Taiwan | Taiwan g0v
metadata.description: Code for Taiwan is an open civic tech community that brings together developers, designers, and citizens to build digital solutions for government transparency and social good.

hero.title: Technology for
hero.description: Code for Taiwan is an open civic tech community that brings together developers, designers, and citizens to build digital solutions for government transparency and social good.

about.title: About Code for Taiwan
about.subtitle: Building better Taiwan through technology and collaboration

mission.description: We foster transparency, accountability, and citizen participation in Taiwan through collaborative development of civic technology.

about.joinUsDescription: Whether you're a developer, designer, or citizen who cares about social issues, we welcome your participation. Let's use technology to make Taiwan better together!
about.corePrinciplesDescription: The fundamental principles that guide our work and community.
about.organizationDescription: Our mission and vision for Taiwan's digital future.
about.teamDescription: Meet the people behind Code for Taiwan.
about.valuesDescription: The core values that drive our community and projects.
about.aboutUsDescription: Code for Taiwan is a community dedicated to advancing civic technology through open source collaboration, using technology to solve social problems and make Taiwan better.
about.missionDescription: We foster transparency, accountability, and citizen participation in Taiwan through collaborative development of civic technology.
about.coreValuesDescription: We uphold the spirit of openness, collaboration, care, and connection, committed to creating positive social impact through technology.
about.achievementsDescription: The impact we've created together with our community partners over the years
about.coreTeamDescription: Key figures driving Taiwan's civic technology development
about.joinUsFullDescription: Whether you're a developer, designer, project manager, or citizen interested in civic technology, you're welcome to join us.
about.copyright: © 2024 Code for Taiwan. Committed to making Taiwan better through technology.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.description: Participate in community activities through various channels and work with like-minded partners for Taiwan's digital democracy.
community.joinDescription: Whether you're a developer, designer, or a citizen who cares about social issues, we welcome your participation. Let's use technology to make Taiwan better together!
